channel.title: Need Team for MassiveScape!
channel.description:
I will be needing a team for my new and improved MassiveScape.
I will be needing the following...
Coder for Server:(will be getting co-owner) Beta Testers: (Will get free Max Cash!) And, i will be needing a Hoster. ( I don't really need one, but it would help out ALOT if i could get one. Thanks.) Web Designer:( For making forums look good, and making a webclient.) (Will give anything if you can get webclient up.)
Here picture of home: [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/k060km.png[/img] Tell me what else you want a picture of and ill put it up ;D
If you would like to join...Please reply with the following app. Thanks.
Name: Age: Position wanted: Time Zone: How long experience:
Thats it! THANKS! ~Czar

item.title: Need Team for MassiveScape!
item.dc:creator: @egyptmo21 egyptmo21
item.description:
@egyptmo21 wrote:

Name: Mohamed
Age: 14 on July 27th
Position wanted: Server Coder, Beta Tester, and Web Designer
Time Zone: Eastern
How long experience: Had my own server since i was 10 (or 9 dont remember)

Read full topic
